title: Can some help me identify this font - or suggest something similar
content:
Hi there  
I would be grateful for your help. Can someone please tell me the name of the font attached. Thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [pizza capri.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090924020834/http:/typophile.com/files/pizza%20capri.jpg) | 21.1 KB |
author: Asam Salim

comments.content:
Hi Jan  
Thanks for your response. How do you know? Is there something similar you could recommend?  
Thanks again.
Different “p”, “i”, “a”, “z” indicate this is hand done. You could search ’brush-drawn’ on myfonts.com for a big list of options.

HI CreativeNRG

Thanks for your post. I am following your suggestion now.
